<a id="CPUParticles2D"></a>

# CPUParticles2D

**Inherits:** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A CPU-based 2D particle emitter.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

CPU-based 2D particle node used to create a variety of particle systems and effects.

See also [GPUParticles2D](GPUParticles2D.md), which provides the same functionality with hardware acceleration, but may not run on older devices.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Particle systems (2D)](../tutorials/2d/particle_systems_2d.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="CPUParticles2D_signal_finished"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**finished**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_signal_finished)

Emitted when all active particles have finished processing. When [one_shot](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_one_shot) is disabled, particles will process continuously, so this is never emitted.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_CPUParticles2D_DrawOrder"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **DrawOrder**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_CPUParticles2D_DrawOrder)

<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_DRAW_ORDER_INDEX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DrawOrder](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_DrawOrder) **DRAW_ORDER_INDEX** = `0`

Particles are drawn in the order emitted.<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_DRAW_ORDER_LIFETIME"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DrawOrder](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_DrawOrder) **DRAW_ORDER_LIFETIME** = `1`

Particles are drawn in order of remaining lifetime. In other words, the particle with the highest lifetime is drawn at the front.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Parameter**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter) **PARAM_ANIM_SPEED** = `10`

Use with [set_param_min()](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_method_set_param_curve) to set animation speed properties.<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_PARAM_ANIM_OFFSET"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter) **PARAM_ANIM_OFFSET** = `11`

Use with [set_param_min()](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_method_set_param_curve) to set animation offset properties.<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_PARAM_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter) **PARAM_MAX** = `12`

Represents the size of the [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter) enum.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_CPUParticles2D_ParticleFlags"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **ParticleFlags**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_CPUParticles2D_ParticleFlags)

<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_PARTICLE_FLAG_ALIGN_Y_TO_VELOCITY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ParticleFlags](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_ParticleFlags) **PARTICLE_FLAG_ALIGN_Y_TO_VELOCITY** = `0`

Use with [set_particle_flag()](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_method_set_particle_flag) to set [particle_flag_align_y](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_particle_flag_align_y).<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_PARTICLE_FLAG_ROTATE_Y"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ParticleFlags](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_ParticleFlags) **PARTICLE_FLAG_ROTATE_Y** = `1`

Present for consistency with 3D particle nodes, not used in 2D.<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_PARTICLE_FLAG_DISABLE_Z"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ParticleFlags](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_ParticleFlags) **PARTICLE_FLAG_DISABLE_Z** = `2`

Present for consistency with 3D particle nodes, not used in 2D.<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_PARTICLE_FLAG_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ParticleFlags](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_ParticleFlags) **PARTICLE_FLAG_MAX** = `3`

Represents the size of the [ParticleFlags](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_ParticleFlags) enum.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **EmissionShape**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape)

<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_POINT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_POINT** = `0`

All particles will be emitted from a single point.<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_SPHERE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_SPHERE** = `1`

Particles will be emitted in the volume of a sphere flattened to two dimensions.<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_SPHERE_SURFACE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_SPHERE_SURFACE** = `2`

Particles will be emitted on the surface of a sphere flattened to two dimensions.<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_RECTANGLE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_RECTANGLE** = `3`

Particles will be emitted in the area of a rectangle.<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS** = `4`

Particles will be emitted at a position chosen randomly among [emission_points](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_points). Particle color will be modulated by [emission_colors](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_colors).<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS** = `5`

Particles will be emitted at a position chosen randomly among [emission_points](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_points). Particle velocity and rotation will be set based on [emission_normals](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_normals). Particle color will be modulated by [emission_colors](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_colors).<a id="CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_MAX** = `6`

Represents the size of the [EmissionShape](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_angle_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Curve](Curve.md) **angle_curve** [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_angle_curve)

Each particle's rotation will be animated along this [Curve](Curve.md). Should be a unit [Curve](Curve.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

Maximum initial angular velocity (rotation speed) applied to each particle in *degrees* per second.

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_anim_offset_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

Each particle's animation offset will vary along this [Curve](Curve.md). Should be a unit [Curve](Curve.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_anim_offset_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **anim_offset_max** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_anim_offset_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Maximum animation offset that corresponds to frame index in the texture. ``0`` is the first frame, ``1`` is the last one. See [CanvasItemMaterial.particles_animation](CanvasItemMaterial.md#CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_animation).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_anim_offset_min"></a>

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_anim_speed_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Curve](Curve.md) **anim_speed_curve** [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_anim_speed_curve)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_curve**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), curve\: [Curve](Curve.md)\ )
- [Curve](Curve.md) **get_param_curve**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Each particle's animation speed will vary along this [Curve](Curve.md). Should be a unit [Curve](Curve.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_anim_speed_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **anim_speed_max** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_anim_speed_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Maximum particle animation speed. Animation speed of ``1`` means that the particles will make full ``0`` to ``1`` offset cycle during lifetime, ``2`` means ``2`` cycles etc.

With animation speed greater than ``1``, remember to enable [CanvasItemMaterial.particles_anim_loop](CanvasItemMaterial.md#CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_anim_loop) property if you want the animation to repeat.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_anim_speed_min"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **anim_speed_min** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_anim_speed_min)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [float](float.md) **get_param_min**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Minimum equivalent of [anim_speed_max](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_anim_speed_max).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [Color](Color.md) **get_color**\ (\ )

Each particle's initial color. If [texture](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_texture) is defined, it will be multiplied by this color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_color_initial_ramp"></a>

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_color_initial_ramp**\ (\ value\: [Gradient](Gradient.md)\ )
- [Gradient](Gradient.md) **get_color_initial_ramp**\ (\ )

Each particle's initial color will vary along this [Gradient](Gradient.md) (multiplied with [color](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_color)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_color_ramp"></a>

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [Gradient](Gradient.md) **get_color_ramp**\ (\ )

Each particle's color will vary along this [Gradient](Gradient.md) over its lifetime (multiplied with [color](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_color)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_damping_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [Curve](Curve.md) **get_param_curve**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Damping will vary along this [Curve](Curve.md). Should be a unit [Curve](Curve.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_damping_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **damping_max** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_damping_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The maximum rate at which particles lose velocity. For example value of ``100`` means that the particle will go from ``100`` velocity to ``0`` in ``1`` second.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_damping_min"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **damping_min** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_damping_min)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [float](float.md) **get_param_min**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_emission_colors"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md) **emission_colors** [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_colors)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emission_colors**\ (\ value\: [PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md)\ )
- [PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md) **get_emission_colors**\ (\ )

Sets the [Color](Color.md)\\ s to modulate particles by when using [EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS) or [EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS).

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_emission_normals"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **emission_normals** [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_normals)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emission_normals**\ (\ value\: [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md)\ )
- [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **get_emission_normals**\ (\ )

Sets the direction the particles will be emitted in when using [EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS).

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_emission_points"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **emission_points** [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_points)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emission_points**\ (\ value\: [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md)\ )
- [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **get_emission_points**\ (\ )

Sets the initial positions to spawn particles when using [EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS) or [EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS).

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_emission_rect_extents"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **emission_rect_extents** [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_rect_extents)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emission_rect_extents**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_emission_rect_extents**\ (\ )

The rectangle's extents if [emission_shape](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_shape) is set to [EMISSION_SHAPE_RECTANGLE](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_RECTANGLE).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_emission_shape"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[EmissionShape](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape) **emission_shape** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_shape)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emission_shape**\ (\ value\: [EmissionShape](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape)\ )
- [EmissionShape](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_EmissionShape) **get_emission_shape**\ (\ )

Particles will be emitted inside this region.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_emission_sphere_radius"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **emission_sphere_radius** [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_sphere_radius)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emission_sphere_radius**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_emission_sphere_radius**\ (\ )

The sphere's radius if [emission_shape](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_emission_shape) is set to [EMISSION_SHAPE_SPHERE](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_SPHERE).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_emitting"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **emitting** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_emitting)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emitting**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_emitting**\ (\ )

If ``true``, particles are being emitted. [emitting](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_emitting) can be used to start and stop particles from emitting. However, if [one_shot](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_one_shot) is ``true`` setting [emitting](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_emitting) to ``true`` will not restart the emission cycle until after all active particles finish processing. You can use the [finished](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_signal_finished) signal to be notified once all active particles finish processing.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_explosiveness"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **explosiveness** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_explosiveness)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_explosiveness_ratio**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_explosiveness_ratio**\ (\ )

How rapidly particles in an emission cycle are emitted. If greater than ``0``, there will be a gap in emissions before the next cycle begins.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_fixed_fps"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **fixed_fps** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_fixed_fps)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fixed_fps**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_fixed_fps**\ (\ )

The particle system's frame rate is fixed to a value. For example, changing the value to 2 will make the particles render at 2 frames per second. Note this does not slow down the simulation of the particle system itself.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_fract_delta"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **fract_delta** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_fract_delta)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fractional_delta**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_fractional_delta**\ (\ )

If ``true``, results in fractional delta calculation which has a smoother particles display effect.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_gravity"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **gravity** = `Vector2(0, 980)` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_gravity)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_gravity**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_gravity**\ (\ )

Gravity applied to every particle.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_hue_variation_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Curve](Curve.md) **hue_variation_curve** [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_hue_variation_curve)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_curve**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), curve\: [Curve](Curve.md)\ )
- [Curve](Curve.md) **get_param_curve**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Each particle's hue will vary along this [Curve](Curve.md). Should be a unit [Curve](Curve.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_hue_variation_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **hue_variation_max** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_hue_variation_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Maximum initial hue variation applied to each particle. It will shift the particle color's hue.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_hue_variation_min"></a>

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_initial_velocity_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **initial_velocity_max** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_initial_velocity_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Maximum initial velocity magnitude for each particle. Direction comes from [direction](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_direction) and [spread](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_spread).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_initial_velocity_min"></a>

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_linear_accel_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **linear_accel_max** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_linear_accel_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), value\: [float](float.md)\ )

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_linear_accel_min"></a>

Minimum equivalent of [linear_accel_max](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_linear_accel_max).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_local_coords"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **local_coords** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_local_coords)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_use_local_coordinates**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_use_local_coordinates**\ (\ )

If ``true``, particles use the parent node's coordinate space (known as local coordinates). This will cause particles to move and rotate along the **CPUParticles2D** node (and its parents) when it is moved or rotated. If ``false``, particles use global coordinates; they will not move or rotate along the **CPUParticles2D** node (and its parents) when it is moved or rotated.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_one_shot"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **one_shot** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_one_shot)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_one_shot**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_one_shot**\ (\ )

If ``true``, only one emission cycle occurs. If set ``true`` during a cycle, emission will stop at the cycle's end.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_orbit_velocity_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Curve](Curve.md) **orbit_velocity_curve** [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_orbit_velocity_curve)

Each particle's orbital velocity will vary along this [Curve](Curve.md). Should be a unit [Curve](Curve.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_orbit_velocity_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **orbit_velocity_max** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_orbit_velocity_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Maximum orbital velocity applied to each particle. Makes the particles circle around origin. Specified in number of full rotations around origin per second.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

Minimum equivalent of [orbit_velocity_max](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_orbit_velocity_max).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_particle_flag_align_y"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **particle_flag_align_y** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_particle_flag_align_y)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_particle_flag**\ (\ particle_flag\: [ParticleFlags](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_ParticleFlags), enable\: [bool](bool.md)\ )

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_preprocess"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **preprocess** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_preprocess)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_pre_process_time**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_pre_process_time**\ (\ )

Particle system starts as if it had already run for this many seconds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_radial_accel_curve"></a>

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_radial_accel_max"></a>

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_randomness"></a>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_scale_curve_x"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

\ [split_scale](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_split_scale) must be enabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

\ [split_scale](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_split_scale) must be enabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_seed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **seed** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_seed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_seed**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_seed**\ (\ )

Sets the random seed used by the particle system. Only effective if [use_fixed_seed](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_use_fixed_seed) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_speed_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **speed_scale** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_speed_scale)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_speed_scale**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_speed_scale**\ (\ )

Particle system's running speed scaling ratio. A value of ``0`` can be used to pause the particles.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_split_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **split_scale** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_split_scale)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_split_scale**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_split_scale**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the scale curve will be split into x and y components. See [scale_curve_x](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_scale_curve_x) and [scale_curve_y](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_scale_curve_y).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_spread"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **spread** = `45.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_spread)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_spread**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_spread**\ (\ )

Each particle's initial direction range from ``+spread`` to ``-spread`` degrees.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_tangential_accel_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Curve](Curve.md) **tangential_accel_curve** [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_tangential_accel_curve)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_curve**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), curve\: [Curve](Curve.md)\ )
- [Curve](Curve.md) **get_param_curve**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Each particle's tangential acceleration will vary along this [Curve](Curve.md). Should be a unit [Curve](Curve.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_tangential_accel_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **tangential_accel_max** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_tangential_accel_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param_max**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Maximum tangential acceleration applied to each particle. Tangential acceleration is perpendicular to the particle's velocity giving the particles a swirling motion.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_tangential_accel_min"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **tangential_accel_min** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_tangential_accel_min)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param_min**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param_min**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Minimum equivalent of [tangential_accel_max](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_tangential_accel_max).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **texture** [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_texture)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_texture**\ (\ )

Particle texture. If ``null``, particles will be squares.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_property_use_fixed_seed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **use_fixed_seed** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_property_use_fixed_seed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_use_fixed_seed**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_use_fixed_seed**\ (\ )

If ``true``, particles will use the same seed for every simulation using the seed defined in [seed](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_seed). This is useful for situations where the visual outcome should be consistent across replays, for example when using Movie Maker mode.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="CPUParticles2D_method_convert_from_particles"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **convert_from_particles**\ (\ particles\: [Node](Node.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_method_convert_from_particles)

Sets this node's properties to match a given [GPUParticles2D](GPUParticles2D.md) node with an assigned [ParticleProcessMaterial](ParticleProcessMaterial.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_method_get_param_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Curve](Curve.md) **get_param_curve**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_method_get_param_curve)

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_method_request_particles_process"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **request_particles_process**\ (\ process_time\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_method_request_particles_process)

Requests the particles to process for extra process time during a single frame.

Useful for particle playback, if used in combination with [use_fixed_seed](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_use_fixed_seed) or by calling [restart()](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_method_restart) with parameter ``keep_seed`` set to ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_method_restart"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **restart**\ (\ keep_seed\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_method_restart)

Restarts the particle emitter.

If `keep_seed` is ``true``, the current random seed will be preserved. Useful for seeking and playback.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CPUParticles2D_method_set_param_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_param_curve**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter), curve\: [Curve](Curve.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#CPUParticles2D_method_set_param_curve)

Sets the [Curve](Curve.md) of the parameter specified by [Parameter](CPUParticles2D.md#enum_CPUParticles2D_Parameter). Should be a unit [Curve](Curve.md).
